casebody.data:
Simon CHARLES,1 Respondent-Below, Appellant,
v.
DEPARTMENT OF SERVICES FOR CHILDREN, YOUTH AND THEIR FAMILIES/DIVISION OF FAMILY SERVICES (DSCYF/DFS), Petitioner-Below, Appellee. In the Interest of: Sarah Fullerton-Charles. No. 552, 2017 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: September 12, 2018
Decided: September 24, 2018

--------

AFFIRMED.

The Court previously assigned pseudonyms to the parties under Supreme Court Rule 7(d).

1
